features.name: Spellcasting
features.description:
The bard is a 4th level spellcster. It's spellcastiing
ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12 +4 to hit with spell attacks).
It has the following bard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): firends, mage hand, vicious mockery
1st level (4 slots): charm person, healing word, heroism, sleep, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, shatter

features.name: Song of Rest
features.description:
The bard can perform a song while taking a short rest.
Any ally who hear the song regains an extra 1d6 hit points
if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at then end of that rest.
The bard can confer this benefit on itlself as well.

features.name: Taunt
features.description:
(2/Day). The bard can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it.
If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on abilityt checks,
attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.
